trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for controls that implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> abstract class.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> class is the base class for many of the various designers in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts> namespace, which provide visual representations of Web Parts controls at design time.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is overridden to always return `true`, so <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> will always render a copy of the associated control rather than the control itself.
Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control associated with this designer.
Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
